alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Garvin; Lincoln; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma; Payne; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 3:13AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of Garvin, Lincoln, Oklahoma, Cleveland, Logan, Payne, Pottawatomie and McClain Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 313 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles south of Stillwater to 3 miles southwest of Wellston to 3 miles west of Goldsby. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Oklahoma City, Norman, eastern Edmond, Moore, Midwest City, Stillwater, Shawnee, Del City, Guthrie, Cushing, Newcastle, Blanchard, Tecumseh, Purcell, Chandler, Choctaw, Noble, Harrah, Slaughterville and McLoud. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 90 and 131, and between mile markers 149 and 170. Interstate 40 between mile markers 151 and 193. Interstate 44 between mile markers 105 and 109, and between mile markers 138 and 182. Interstate 240 between mile markers 2 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleveland; Garvin; Lincoln; Logan; McClain; Oklahoma; Payne; Pottawatomie
